pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculating Political System Metrics // A toolbox to facilitate the calculation of political system indicators for researchers. This package offers a variety of basic indicators related to electoral systems, party systems, elections, and parliamentary studies, as well as others. Main references are: Loosemore and Hanby (1971) doi:10.1017/S000712340000925X; Gallagher (1991) doi:10.1016/0261-3794(91)90004-C; Laakso and Taagepera (1979) doi:10.1177/001041407901200101; Rae (1968) doi:10.1177/001041406800100305; Hirschma (1945) ISBN:0-520-04082-1; Kesselman (1966) doi:10.2307/1953769; Jones and Mainwaring (2003) doi:10.1177/13540688030092002; Rice (1925) doi:10.2307/2142407; Pedersen (1979) doi:10.1111/j.1475-6765.1979.tb01267.x; SANTOS (2002) ISBN:85-225-0395-8.
